name: Un Indien Dans La Ville
overview: Un indien dans la ville (An Indian in the city) is a 1994 French film by Hervé Palud. The film had a limited English language release under the title "Little Indian, Big City". It was later adapted for an American audience under the title "Jungle 2 Jungle", set in Manhattan and starring Tim Allen and Martin Short. A tie in game for the Game Boy was released only in France.
